pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhuñjamānā sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.3.1_0: “Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.4_0: Na bhuñjamānena sabbo hattho mukhe pakkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
